metadata.title: CVE-2024-22636 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description: PluXml Blog v5.8.9 was discovered to contain a remote code execution (RCE)vulnerability in the Static Pages feature. This vulnerability is exploitedvia injecting a crafted payload into the Content field.

criterions.comment: pluxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
